mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_NO AS commentNo, C.USER_ID AS userId, C.COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, DATE_FORMAT(C.COMMENT_RDATE, '%Y.%m.%d') AS formattedCommentRdate, COALESCE(LC.likeCount, 0) AS likeCount, EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LOVE l WHERE l.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND l.USER_ID = #{loginUserId}) AS lovedByLoginUser, COALESCE(CR.RATING, 0) AS commentRating FROM COMMENT C LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM LOVE GROUP BY COMMENT_NO) LC ON C.COMMENT_NO = LC.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN comment_rating CR ON C.COMMENT_NO = CR.COMMENT_NO WHERE C.isbn = #{isbn} AND C.COMMENT_STATE = '1' ORDER BY C.COMMENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{perPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE isbn = #{isbn} AND COMMENT_STATE = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (USER_ID, isbn, BOOK_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_RDATE, COMMENT_STATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{isbn}, #{bookNo}, #{commentContent}, NOW(), '1')
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO AS commentNo, USER_ID AS userId FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
